parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. Separate multiple accelerated domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: Functions
parameters.description:
The list of features. Format: `[{"functionArgs":[{"argName":"parameter key","argValue":"parameter value"},{"argName":"xx","argValue":"xx"}],"functionName": feature name"}]`

> Separate multiple parameters with commas (,).
